blog.name: ao3feed-shouji
blog.title: Shouji Mezou
blog.description: An automatic feed of fics for Shouji Mezou from My Hero Academia posted on Archive of Our Own. If there's an issue or if you have any questions, let me know! (For those on mobile, search "tags" to see the taglist!)

title: The Beginning Of Something Wonderful
description:
by MissDragon

The Scientist nicknamed Inko, whom he had seen as his new mother, helped him escape before she went to sleep. For this monster had the ability to grant wishes upon command. She had given him a name, Izuku. It is his one and true name. He couldn’t remember why names were important to him. In honor of her memory, he granted her final wish, The world would be a place where he would not be looked at as a freak. So Izuku called upon his power and granted the humans what was to be known as quirks. Tired and exhausted from running he called upon his powers for the last time, to rest.

Words: 1809, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: Multi
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Nezu, Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic, Shuuzenji Chiyo | Recovery Girl, Kan Sekijirou | Vlad King, Lunch-Rush (My Hero Academia), Bakugou Katsuki, Bakugou Mitsuki, Midoriya Inko, Midoriya Hisashi, Todoroki Shouto, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Ishiyama Ken | Cementoss, Kayama Nemuri | Midnight, Ectoplasm (My Hero Academia), Aoyama Yuuga, Ashido Mina, Asui Tsuyu, Iida Tenya, Uraraka Ochako, Ojiro Mashirao, Kaminari Denki, Kirishima Eijirou, Kouda Kouji, Satou Rikidou, Shouji Mezou, Jirou Kyouka, Sero Hanta, Tokoyami Fumikage, Hagakure Tooru, Yaoyorozu Momo
  • Relationships: Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead/Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic
  • Additional Tags: monster!Izuku, Dead Midoriya Hisashi, Dead Midoriya Inko, Midoriya Izuku Has a Quirk, Midoriya Izuku is a Ray of Sunshine, midoriya izuku is a monster, Midoriya Izuku Has Multiple Quirks, Midoriya Izuku is a Nerd, Izuku created quirks, Izuku is a creature like Nezu, Izuku doesn’t have a last name, Midoriya is someone else in this fic, dont worry it will make sense, Not Canon Compliant, seriously this isnt canon at all, Original Character(s), Original quirks - Freeform, BAMF Midoriya Izuku, Overpowered Midoriya Izuku, Blood and Violence, Human Experimentation, animal experimentation, Parental Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, parental nezu, Alternate Universe - Mineta Minoru Doesn’t Exist, Sorry Not Sorry, Cute Midoriya Izuku, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Anxiety, Depression, Out of Character, Out of Character Midoriya Izuku, Out of Character Bakugou Katsuki

title: de miel (of honey)
description:
by rednitroglycerin

Kirishima is not unbreakable, and Bakugou is not smoke screens and gunpowder.

The distant AU where Bakugou is not cut out to be a pro-hero like he thought he’d be, and most definitely not in the way he predicted.

blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Lemon Boy
description:
by inanimaterambles

Because, because, why doesn’t he hate Bakugou? He’s angry all the time, and he’s hard to talk to, hard to deal with and in the first few months of their tentative friendship it was so hard to hang out with other people when Bakugou seemed so determined to push them away.
After all Bakugou’s put him through, why doesn’t Kirishima hate him?

Or, the fix-it to last times disaster.

Words: 4442, Chapters: ½, Language: English

Series: Part 6 of spoon’s uni au

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Kirishima Eijirou, Bakugou Katsuki, Todoroki Shouto, Midoriya Izuku, Kaminari Denki, Sero Hanta, Ashido Mina
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Kaminari Denki/Sero Hanta
  • Additional Tags: Mild Hurt/Comfort, Mutual Pining, Alternate Universe - College/University, Alternate Universe - No Quirks (My Hero Academia), Underage Drinking, very mild manga spoilers, Getting Together

summary: Shoji finds a love letter and he finds out it’s from Reiko.
question: Shoji finds a love letter and he finds out it’s from Reiko.
answer:
Okabe can mean the basic yokai, but I read in a book that they can appear as beautiful women in some cases.

While Yurei is a spirit that isn’t given a proper burial and dwells on negative emotions.
